arm_group.description: Those patients undergoing either traumatic amputation or surgical amputation of limb

arm_group.arm_group_label: A cohort  post limb conserving surgery
arm_group.description: Patients whose surgical management involved conservation of their injured limb

brief_summary.textblock:
The prospective cohort study, SuTra2, assesses the functional and socio-economic status of
      patients who were operated on for a severe limb injury resulting in amputation or limb
      preservation 1 and 2 years after the 2010 Haiti earthquake.

clinical_study.brief_title: Monitoring and Treatment of Extremity Trauma for Mass Casualties in Difficult Contexts

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients, with limb injuries due to the earthquake,

          -  Who underwent limb surgery, which ended up in limb amputation or limb conservation.

        Exclusion criteria :

          -  Limb injury not related to the earthquake

          -  No surgery for the limb injury

study_pop.textblock:
Patients will be recruited by phone from databases issued by:

          -  A surgical clinic, The Clinique Lambert (Pétion-Ville, Haiti),

          -  Two non-governmental organizations

               -  Handicap International (HI)

               -  Bangladesh Rural Advancement Committee (BRAC),

          -  A local organization l'Union des Jeunes Victimes du Séisme (UJVS)

link.description: ALIMA website with links within to full study protocol in French

clinical_study.official_title: Suivi et Traitement du Traumatisme Des Membres en Cas d'Afflux Massif de blessés Dans Les Contextes Difficiles

oversight_info.authority: Haiti: Ministry of Public Health and Population

primary_outcome.measure: Patient Satisfaction with Musculoskeletal functional recovery

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
